variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-flask
dependencies.description: A simple framework for building complex web applications.

dependencies.name: py-markupsafe
dependencies.description:
MarkupSafe is a library for Python that implements a unicode string that
is aware of HTML escaping rules and can be used to implement automatic
string escaping. It is used by Jinja 2, the Mako templating engine, the
Pylons web framework and many more.

dependencies.name: py-decorator
dependencies.description:
The aim of the decorator module it to simplify the usage of decorators
for the average programmer, and to popularize decorators by showing
various non-trivial examples.

dependencies.name: py-itsdangerous
dependencies.description: Various helpers to pass trusted data to untrusted environments.

dependencies.name: py-brotlipy
dependencies.description: Python binding to the Brotli library.

dependencies.name: py-raven
dependencies.description: Raven is a client for Sentry.

dependencies.name: py-werkzeug
dependencies.description: The Swiss Army knife of Python web development

dependent_to.name: py-pytest-httpbin
dependent_to.description: Easily test your HTTP library against a local copy of httpbin
